sentences.en: Another solution is to have adjustable foils.
sentences.cn: 另一种办法是装上可调水翼.

sentences.en: Auto - temp control and no - rate speed adjustment make even heating and adjustable speed.
sentences.cn: 自控温度与无级调速系列,使加热均匀,速度可调.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page. Right - click to make non - adjustable or normally closed.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上. 右击可以成为不可调整的或通常闭合的.

sentences.en: Exposing energy is adjustable, and the homogeneity of exposure is better.
sentences.cn: 曝光能量可调, 曝光均匀性更好.

sentences.en: Gas cookers are adjustable in height to line up with your kitchen work top.
sentences.cn: 燃气灶的高度可调整，使之与厨房操作台齐平。

sentences.en: More expensive cameras have adjustable focusing.
sentences.cn: 比较贵的照相机有可调焦距.

sentences.en: Shutoff control is by means of an adjustable spring.
sentences.cn: 切断控制通过可调整弹簧实现.

sentences.en: Steering axis inclination is measure in degrees and is not adjustable.
sentences.cn: 转向轴倾斜程度是衡量和不可调.

sentences.en: The bags have adjustable shoulder straps.
sentences.cn: 这些包的肩带可以调整。

sentences.en: The center of support should be made adjustable.
sentences.cn: 支承中心应做成可调的.

sentences.en: The chair has the virtue of being adjustable.
sentences.cn: 这种椅子具有可调节的优点.

sentences.en: The height of the bicycle seat is adjustable.
sentences.cn: 这辆自行车车座的高度可以调节。

sentences.en: The sampling system is controlled by an adjustable program timer or by a manual pushbutton.
sentences.cn: 取样系统用可调程序定时器或手动操作的按纽控制.

sentences.en: The stroke may be limited by adjustable stops.
sentences.cn: 该行程可借助可调的止动螺钉加以限位.

words.tran_cn: [自] 调节器；调停者；（保险等）理算员

trans.tran_en: that can be moved to different positions or changed in shape or size
